word: G2358 - θριαμβεύω - thriambeúō - three-am-byoo'-o - To triumph

sections.paragraph: to triumph, to celebrate a triumph

ஆங்கில மூலம் / Original in English: From a prolonged compound of the base of G2360 and a derivative of G680 (meaning a noisy iambus, sung in honor of Bacchus); to make an acclamatory procession, that is, (figuratively) to conquer or (by Hebraism) to give victory: - (cause) to triumph (over).
